name: Celestial President
description:
This game was made for the Trijam #212, whose theme was "Too much".

Welcome, Celestial President. The year is 0 ACU(After Celestial Union), and the Celestial Union has been founded. A myriad of Star Systems have joined together, represented by the Chamber of Celestial Representatives.

Manage individual systems' satisfaction and unrest, deal with the CCR, who are elected every 2 years, and try to keep yourself from being voted out. This might seem easy, but remember - there could be thousands of systems for you to manage. 

Good luck!
